name: doc-convert
description: Convert between document formats using LibreOffice
author: uniconv

dependencies.name: python3
dependencies.install_hint: brew install python3 (macOS) or apt install python3 (Linux)

dependencies.name: libreoffice
dependencies.install_hint: brew install libreoffice (macOS) or apt install libreoffice (Linux)

dependencies.name: pandoc
dependencies.install_hint: brew install pandoc (macOS) or apt install pandoc (Linux)

dependencies.name: pdf2docx
dependencies.description: Required for PDF to DOCX conversion

dependencies.name: pyhwp
dependencies.description: Required for HWP conversion on systems where LibreOffice lacks the HWP filter
dependencies.install_hint: pip install pyhwp six
